website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for Monster Beats-style sound at a more affordable price, the Sol Republic Tracks should be on your short list.
pros: The Sol Republic Tracks headphones are light, fairly comfortable, and sport a durable design with a convenient interchangeable headband, detachable cordage, and an integrated microphone and remote control
They sound good, delivering deep bass, and are affordable at $99
cons: The sound isn't terribly detailed, and the on-ear-design can rub certain ears the wrong way

customer_reviews.title: Best headphomes ever
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are one of the best products I have ever bought from amazon. They are xtremely durable, and the characteristic to bend and twist is really convenient, considering the last 4 pairs of headphones that I had cracked right on the headband. I still have these headphones after 2 years, and they still work and look as if they're brand new. Love the customization!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I wanted, but I still love them
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the color I wanted, I got red, but I don't really care, these are Sol Republic, and Sol Republic is awesome, they have awesome bass response, and sound as clear as my fathers klipsch stereo speakers, these are the Cadillac of the low end. these headphones cost 80$ brand new, i got mine for 30$. These sound just as good if not better than beats by dre.
customer_reviews.author: Silverbullet

customer_reviews.title: SOL REPUBLIC Headphones review.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are absolutely great! I was really looking for Headphones that were like an "all in one," noise cancelling, good bass, clear sound, nice comfort and affordable. This is exactly what I got in the the SOL's. However the only downside that I've had with these is that is that whenever I wear them over an extended period of time the ear cushions get hot. Other than that, these headphones are Just as good or even BETTER than any of the top Headphones at there.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Few problems with it....
customer_reviews.text: It only works best with apple products becuase when I plug it into my Samsung Galaxy the volume up and volume down buttons don't work and it is also written on the box that is for apple products which is not displayed in amazon. Another thing that I dislike is that after wearing them for a while my ears start to hurt and I have to take them off until they don't hurt no more. But overall it has great sound.
customer_reviews.author: mercedes pontier

customer_reviews.title: Those SOL Republic headphones are the bests
customer_reviews.text: I ordered those SOL Republic headphones for workout. I live listening to music when I’m at the gym and don’t like distractions. When I have those headphones on, I feel focused on my workout only. The noise cancellation is great, the quality is great and it’s very comfortable. I’d definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gershon Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in product:(
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my son for Christmas. He was able to use them for three months and then the left side quit working. We homeschool at her house, so it is very important that we have a good set of headphones for each kid. He is without headphones as of now until I can research another pair:(
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Best Sounding
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound great and produce great bass which cannot be heard on cheaper brands. Ive tried many, these are my favorite. They actually jump a bit given the right bass track. Great response, sounds like you are there
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Too tight on ears but good sound
customer_reviews.text: the only reason why i gave it a 4 star is because it is very tight on your ears and after a while it starts to make you're ears red and kind of hurt. i kept having to take them off every 20 minutes or so to adjust them because it kept bothering me how tight it was. also the angle of it inst so good, i definitely would've preferred a headband from them that is made at an angle so that it can fit on you're head snug. Other wise the quality is very good and the sound is great with nice sounding bass.
customer_reviews.author: Kellogg.xyz

customer_reviews.title: 3 yrs late review, and used daily ( still working perfect )
customer_reviews.text: Guess i missed reviewing these.. Well its now 3yrs later since date of purchase (april 7,2013) . There still being used to this day, I had a pair of beats solos which honestly i didnt see the hype as there sub par compared to the sol quality.. As well many dont even know what SOL headphones look like so your not just following that hip trend.. The quality on these head phones is amazing, Still using the same wires, and ear pieces / band that came with them.. IF your gonna get high end headphones id recommend checking SOL tracks out.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: For the price that I am paying, this product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The built quality is really good. The audio quality is superb! Totally recommend this to anyone who wants a mid-range headphone. Audio leakage is quite audible but it's quite common for on-ear headphones. Noise isolation is very good. The ear cups are very comfortable indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Mohd Firdaus

customer_reviews.title: ... of SOL Republic headphones for me and my boyfriend loved them so much we ordered him a pair the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of SOL Republic headphones for me and my boyfriend loved them so much we ordered him a pair the day mine arrived. Needless to say we love these headphones, if you like bass you'll love these! Very comfortable and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These hit all notes! I LOVE these.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! And SO proud of the price savings, too. :)
customer_reviews.author: MamaOThree

customer_reviews.title: So - So
customer_reviews.text: The headphones only sound "ok" with a more muffled sound than expected. The most annoying feature is the head-band. It's not easy to slide the cans up and down. Also, those with smaller heads leave more of the headband exposed below the cans, and the exposed parts of the band "rub" on collars, coats and such. This rubbing sound is amplified directly into the ears of the wearer.
customer_reviews.author: Rich S.

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Second pair bought. First pair working well, bought another one for another family member. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Ecker Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! He made everyone around try them out after receiving them because he was so impressed with the sound. He wanted a pair after trying out his buddies. The headband is a nice feature. They are easy to replace if they ever become broken or if you just want to switch up the style. The price was reasonable and the quality is very comparable to beats by dre
customer_reviews.author: D&T

customer_reviews.title: Bad cable shorting
customer_reviews.text: Straight out the box and it has a bad cable. Played 1 time then went back out. Sounded great when it worked
customer_reviews.author: Travis Peake

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great! They are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cheaper alternative to Beats by Dre, SOL REPUBLIC is it. These headphones are great! They are comfortable, durable and the overall sound quality is above average. My only criticism would be the volume. I am using these headphones with my Samsung galaxy 4, opposed to an iphone, and personally, I would like a little more volume at the max level on my phone. But overall, a very good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Sonic Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Great design, sturdy, quality build and seals around the ear so it's good for use in noisy environments. Decent sound quality without the hyperinflated bass of other headphones. Adjusts to just about any head size. Initially squeezes pretty firmly so you may feel the pressure after an hour or so until the headset relaxes after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound
customer_reviews.text: No where in any literature I read for these headphones does it say that the remote controls only work with Apple products. Only reason I bought the darn things was to upgrade the ear buds from my Galaxy S5. Not happy. Use them with my Power book but the remote doesn't even work with it. Amazon, need to require compatability info!
customer_reviews.author: cricket 4103

customer_reviews.title: Much better than beats
customer_reviews.text: Much better than beats. Good Bass, Clear sound and it looks very stylish too. Got it to replace a beats solo hd that hurt my ears in the long hours i wear it. The headbands are very sturdy and come in handful of colors. Overall very good headphone for half of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar DeSouza

customer_reviews.title: Not for android
customer_reviews.text: Great and cheap headphones. Very comfy, good sound, looks nice and just all around great. Except for the fact that the cord it has is not compatable with android or at least just my samsung s5.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Even my Grandma wants a pair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. they are very clear and have decent base. The volume buttons on the cord do not work but ive chalked that up to my phone being an android when these headphones were made for the I phone in mind. All in all I really love them and they got here almost a work week early. if in the future I need a pair of headpones ill be sure to check Goldstar Tech!!!
customer_reviews.author: LunariDraconis

customer_reviews.title: The great thing is that instead of replacing the entire headphone ...
customer_reviews.text: I still own these headphones almost three years later. I have had to replace the cord, but that is only because I am rough with it. I do a lot of woodworking and the cord always gets caught on the corner of things (my fault) and gets yanked out. The great thing is that instead of replacing the entire headphone set, I am able to just buy a new replacement cord. The price is amazing for the quality and durability you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about them, accept...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, awesome design to be able to either replace any piece that breaks, or swap colors with friends, after about an hour or so they start to get a little anyoing, but I figure an hour is long enough and time for a small break so no biggie. I very strongly recomend these for the audio critic that likes bass.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Hands down THE BEST off the shelf headphones under $100
customer_reviews.text: Dr dre Beats headphones that cost $300 don't even come close to these $60 specials. Do your research, listen to these Tracks headphones at your local Verizon store. This is my 2nd pair, can't get enough of sol republic products. These even sound better than the Bose wireless headphones (also a side by side sound comparison at my local Verizon wireless store) GET THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Beats By Dr. Dre WHO???Sol Republic Tracks are the Best.
customer_reviews.text: What can i say...BASS,clarity,great overall sound,just like what i remembered when i tried them on months ago. Sol republic Tracks are better than those overpriced beats by dr.dre solos & solo HDs. And for only $67 not counting shipping & handling,and a 2 year warranty all for $92 isnt bad at all,pretty good deal,very satisfied A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.author: Gio G.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but there are better options
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Avantree Audition, these are less comfortable. These sounded good but i returned because I didn't realize they're wired (my bad) and we wanted Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Love

customer_reviews.title: Rumbling bass
customer_reviews.text: If you like deep rumbling bass, then these are for you. Lite weight and very comfy. The highs are adequate, but I got them for the bass. The seller shipped item in original package with all accompanying booklets and stickers. I would do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR MAYO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones. Ever since I've had these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. Ever since I've had these headphones, they have withstood many different environments and kept high-quality sound. I actually have a difficult time listening to my favorite songs in my car or with "normal" headphones now. The quality I get from these headphones is pretty great. I loved these headphones so much that I also had to buy my mother a pair for her birthday. She says the same things! A definite recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crawford

customer_reviews.title: ... 3rd pair we have bought because they do have great sound but they won’t last longer than a year
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair we have bought because they do have great sound but they won’t last longer than a year. They just stop working. Bummed
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THESE FOR MY GIRL she said its nice looking and sound nice... as long she is happy im fine with it ..but the removable everything is a nice feature so u can just replace the part that is broken. but also u can mix match colors
customer_reviews.author: michael qi

customer_reviews.title: Seriously. Amazing headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Buy them if you're considering it. Incredible sound, very comfortable, and they're noise-cancelling. You can change out the band, and it makes it super easy to adjust them to fit your head. Don't waste your money on Bose or Dr. Beats or anything. Just get these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Easnadh

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: In less than 24 hours, I have used these headphones to listen to classical, jazz, hip hop and musical theatre! I love how comfortable they are to workout in. They hardly feel like they are there! I used them this morning as I went on my walk and I was happy that I could still hear ambiant noise so that I wasn't completely shut out from trains and cars.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Calvo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is on point and clear. I love being able to switch to headset mode for incoming calls. I wished the volume control was for both headset and music only works for answering phones. Besides that no complaints and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Headphones HAD good sound quality and were relatively comfortable for less than an hour and a half. after that hey started to hurt my ears. Then after about 2 months of wearing the headphones, the cables stopped working and I was only getting audio out of one ear and then no sound at all. If you want good on-ear style headphones, DO NOT BUY THESE. I would recommend either beats solo 2 or v-moda.
customer_reviews.author: michael neale

customer_reviews.title: not too comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Would not fit if you ears are big, not too comfortable to wear, but sound quality is really good!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene K

customer_reviews.title: not so good
customer_reviews.text: After a an our or so, it becomes unconfortable for me. Also, its sound is a little bit high on the bass. I'm gonna try to sell it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sol Good
customer_reviews.text: Got these at a great price...Super price in fact...it's my second pair one month...theses are the V8s...I also have the silver V10s...both are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: blackbaron

customer_reviews.title: Sound is really great but they hurt my ears after 2 or 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is really great but they hurt my ears after 2 or 3 hours, because they're so tight, and I have a smaller head than most people (most sunglasses are just too big for my head). I've gotten used to it some more so it's not as much of an issue as it was at the beginning. This is my first set of on-ear headphones so I'm not sure if ear pain is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Itwaru

customer_reviews.title: Badass!
customer_reviews.text: Badass Headphones! Better than Beats, cheaper as well. I bought these in hopes of getting a dope pair for a good price. I feel like I scammed SOL!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gyeabour

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my grandson and he loves them. Outstanding quality, great style and great audio. Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: shel

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for my 17 year old son. He said the sound is fine and they are comfortable to wear. I can't imagine spending more for the other popular brands.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dorrian

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price~Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for son who is away at college. I didn't want to spend a ton of money, he wanted something that would noise-canceling - He LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: Judy M.

customer_reviews.title: But if you can get this under $40 its a great deal. Audio quality is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kinda uncomfortable for longer periods of time. But if you can get this under $40 its a great deal. Audio quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my son and they have lasted longer then any he's had. Good sound,deep bass and completely interchangeable components.
customer_reviews.author: jason s miller

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the comfort and style of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after realizing my old Sony's were broken and I needed a new set of over the ear. Absolutely love the comfort and style of headphones. I can wear these all day long when I study and they don't bug my ears which is a definite plus. Love the sound quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are much,much better than the Beats in the same class. Clarity is excellentand bass is clean. Very sturdy and well built. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: good but wrong jack type
customer_reviews.text: I would like to mention that these do not work with Android devices (I have an android mini) they are simple and good just don't have the right jack. I'll give 4 starts because these will be returned in hope of getting the set with only a 3.5mm jack. Also please list device compatibilies when they have accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Weller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound & great price. In my opinion better sounding than Beats by Dre and way more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Trojansfan

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats
customer_reviews.text: These are a much better quality than Beats. The sound is crisp and the options for personalization are great. By far a much better product

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughter for her bday after testing them out in our local retail store. Best price on Amazon & these sound 10 times better than beats!

customer_reviews.title: 3 months in and still in perfect condition: )
customer_reviews.text: My brother manages to break every head set given to him. 3 months in and still in perfect condition :)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Better than beats.
customer_reviews.text: There great sound amazing and good base. The sound better than beats also.they are hard to break so you don't have to worry about that.

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. seem very sturdy. I like that it comes in components and you can replace the wire or the ear pieces or the bar. one of my ears does get sore after wearing for an hour, but not bad. I would recommend these headphones.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this headphone sounds great if you are a bass head this is the head phone for you

customer_reviews.title: better than Beats.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones look great and sound great. It meets our expectations.

customer_reviews.title: High End Sound for a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones! Great bass! Why pay $150-$200 for the SAME product! Great value!!!

customer_reviews.title: Better value!
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent. As good as, if not better than, Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Glenicus

customer_reviews.title: I love this headphones
customer_reviews.text: They sound amazing! I had a pair of Beats headphones before and these ones are way better than Beats. Better price, better sound, better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: NOT A FAVORITE WITH MY DEVICE.
customer_reviews.text: DIDN'T LIKE THESE HEAD PHONES. MAYBE THEY AREN'T COMPATIBLE WITH MY IPOD CLASSIC...HAD TO USE THE EQUALIZER TO TRIM THE BASS DOWN AND STILL NOT 100%. REALLY WELL MADE AND COOL LOOKING BUT THE SOUND FOR ME WAS NOT GOOD. TRIED DIFFERENT SOUND SETTINGS AND STILL THESE HEADPHONES SOUNDED EITHER BASS OVERDRIVEN OR MUFFLED. TURNED OFF THE SOUND SETTING COMPLETELY AND SOUNDED CHEAP. YOU MIGHT HAVE BETTER LUCK WITH YOUR DEVICE.
customer_reviews.author: L2

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones. Comfortable. I only use them at home with my laptop, so I can't speak to how well they work when walking about.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids when using electronics in the car.
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these when he is playing on his iPad, and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: IKHyland

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Fit is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Fit is fantastic, and sound is way better than the price tag would suggest. Only caveat- the mic and volume buttons do not work with Android devices.
customer_reviews.author: Da Guru

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were great. Just thought it would have been louder.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Heahphoes are comfortable, sounds great and have a solid noise canceling functionality Highly recommend this product. Delivered very timely and as described

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - heavy bass -cancels out lots of outdoor noise -very durable -cool looking Cons: -ear pads get uncomfortable very fast. My head starts to hurt after a few min
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance.
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my husband and he absolutely LOVES them!!! Perfect balance of highs and bass and noise reduction.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall They sound really good. Bass sound is a litlle heavy but otherwise sounds good. Would recommend to listeners that prefer bass heavy sound.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. Super deep and clear bass and good quality. Must-have!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones. They sound great. Bought them for my daughter and she loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great range of sound, comfortable fit. I can wear these for an entire work day without any discomfort.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazingly low-priced item considering the value I am receiving out of these headphones already. Incredibly durable - and they sound amazing! I've had many friends say they like how these sound better than the Beats by Dre (which cost upwards of $200). Thanks for the great transaction
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but the first time I plugged them in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but the first time I plugged them in they didn't work and the 3 botton control does not work
customer_reviews.author: mandito

customer_reviews.title: great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: they won't break! you can twist them backwards and they still won't break. It's a great concept; esp for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They are bitchin
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I have ever bought it sounds great has good bass I've had theses for a while way better and cheaper than beats, I recommend these for anyone the headbands don't snap you can bend them as far as you want
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cable did not come with the headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these headphones, however the 3 button mic cable did not come with it. I assume the headphones are amazing, but unfortunately they are no more than a paper weight at this stage.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, my 14 year old loves them! The price is much more affordable than other brands such as Beats. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: They have great sound but I have a couple of issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: They have great sound but I have a couple of issues with this product. First of all the one that was received was a one button and not a three button like it was advertised. Also after a couple of months the left ear started to loss the sound. I found out that the cable must be moved into a specific location before it can play sound into the left ear. I feel that this is poor design, but it is worth the money. I just wish it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: The object is good and i like it. But I received the version with 1 button, but I ordered the version with 3 buttons
customer_reviews.author: Mattia DL

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: these headphones have excellent sound. The music plays rich and the bass doesn't crack. I highly recommend them!!! Cons: No cons

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphone look and feel, but sound quality went south
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphone look and feel, but sound quality went south after about 3 weeks of normal use. Could have been a lemon in the bunch. Unfortunately, had to return for refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the wires are externally fine, the wire on one side just quit working
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these lasted 2 months. They were handled gently, the wires are externally fine, the wire on one side just quit working. A horrible waste of money: 60 days of use for $60 is not very good value.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is some of the best looking and great sound quality for the price.but i wouldn't really recommend for audio files.

customer_reviews.text: My son really loves these headphone... Best gift ever. A great Christmas or Birthday gift for teen. A must have

customer_reviews.title: SOL REPUBLIC 1211-01 Headphones
customer_reviews.text: They work and feel real good. Cost is a little high but cheaper then Target / Wal-Mart Have no complaints so far
customer_reviews.author: mike Quiros

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife so she could watch her TV shows on her iPad. She loves them, which makes me happy. Great sound, great build, great product!

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. I paid a lot of money for these as a gift for my son and they broke after he only had them for 40 days. Because they were more than 30 days old I am stuck with them. Next time I will buy stuff like this at Wal-Mart where I can at least return them! Very disappointed in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: sherrie s

customer_reviews.title: Muddy and muffled sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had planed on using these for my Iphone5. Turns out the standard ear buds that came with the phone were much better. These headphones produce way too much bass causing muffled and muddy sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny227

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: The process was painless.... Got exactly what I wanted!! Was fast and easy. Price was same as local stores although didn't have to go through the Christmas rush!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mojica

customer_reviews.title: But what really is wonderful to me is that it also has a microphone ...
customer_reviews.text: A headphone that has incredible sound when you connect it to your Android, Apple, MP3, PC, etc and so forth. But what really is wonderful to me is that it also has a microphone and works to calls on your cell phones. My son uses it for some of his online games, too. It has worked so well that I haven't had to worry about trying to swap out some of the components, yet, either, but I have toyed with switching some out just to have one that is a bit more colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: strictly average
customer_reviews.text: Much to my disappointment sol republic headphones are average at best. These are not as good as beats by d. dre by any stretch of the imagination. If you want a decent pair of headphones for a bargain price this is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Had to return this item
customer_reviews.text: The aux cable was defective which caused the left side not to play. The volume control on the 3-button mic didn't work, it only paused the music or activated Siri.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Should be a great product
customer_reviews.text: Should be a stellar product, but my son's stopped working right away. Had to return to seller. Might try again to see if it was a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They don't tell you, but these are the V8 version headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth F Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but expected at least one interchangeable band😭 so kinda disappointed. Other than that great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. I got my son these and he loved them. However the wire can break. So my son covinced me to buy him these. The he did was he kept telling me to get him beats but then he said to get these and showed me a video and some one gave these the ultimate stress test
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: I should have gotten the HD ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphone thinking it was going to have great sound quality yet it was just average. I only main reason I wanted these was because of its design. The sound quality of these headphones are not really worth $100 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: lisha yao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was a little leery as we have Beats and are very pleased with them. These are great! Super! Fantastic! and half the price. Would buy these again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Housewithfourboys

customer_reviews.title: Great but got the wrong ones
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones to replace my beats. As far as sound quality, and overall quality they are great. However, I am a little disappointed, I ordered the pair with the three button mic, and received a pair with a one button mic. I didn't bother returning them because I didn't think it was worth the hassle. Anyway, they are a great pair of headphones and I would definitely recommend them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Rizzo

product_meta.title: SOL REPUBLIC 1211-01 Tracks On-Ear Interchangeable Headphones with 3-Button Mic and Music Control - Black
product_meta.description: Sol Republic's 1211-01 Tracks On-Ear Interchangeable Headphones with 3-Button Mic + Music Control, in black, feature V8 sound engine speakers. Tracks can be remixed with a stylish selection of switchable cables and headbands. Fully loaded with deep bass and high clarity, you can feel the full power of your music. The SonicSoft Speaker Pads with extra-wide, noise-isolating ear cushions let you enjoy your music in comfort for hours. Constructed of polymer compound, the FlexTech Sound Track headband is built to withstand heavy abuse. Twist it, bend it, drop it, these headbands are virtually indestructible. The 3-button mic + music control lets you adjust the volume, pause/resume/skip music and answer/hang-up calls. Plus, the high clarity mic captures every word possible.
